entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
